pages.text: Gohei is a meele weapon that can also launch range AoE attacks with bullet hell (danmaku). $(br2)To select a different style of danmaku, hold alt key while scrolling mousewheel.
The higher player's Power is, the more damage Gohei deals.$(br2)Also used in the creation of The Altar.
